Name: Medium-Slow
Formula: {"expression": "((6 * x^3) / 5) - (15 * x^2) + (100 * x) - 140", "description": "More complex curve; slower early levels, faster later"}

Name: Slow then Very Fast
Formula: {"piecewise": [{"condition": "x <= 50", "expression": "(x^3 * (100 - x)) / 50"}, {"condition": "50 < x <= 68", "expression": "(x^3 * (150 - x)) / 100"}, {"condition": "68 < x <= 98", "expression": "(x^3 * (1274 + ((x % 3)^2) - 9 * (x % 3) - 20 * floor(x / 3))) / 1000"}, {"condition": "x > 98", "expression": "(x^3 * (160 - x)) / 100"}], "description": "Highly irregular growth pattern"}

Name: Fast then Very Slow
Formula: {"piecewise": [{"condition": "x <= 15", "expression": "(x^3 * (24 + floor((x + 1) / 3))) / 50"}, {"condition": "15 < x <= 35", "expression": "(x^3 * (14 + x)) / 50"}, {"condition": "x > 35", "expression": "(x^3 * (32 + floor(x / 2))) / 50"}], "description": "Starts fast, then levels off gradually"}
